title: GitRepo.commit() fails with diff.ignoreSubmodules=all
body:
I noticed this when working on the test for c14c3a490. Here's a recipe to reproduce:

<details>
<summary>script</summary>

```sh
#!/bin/sh

set -eu

cd $(mktemp -dt dl-XXXXXXX)

datalad create
datalad create subds
datalad save

(cd subds && touch foo && datalad save)
git config diff.ignoreSubmodules all
datalad save
```

I haven't looked into it yet, but I suspect the easiest solution may be to just set diff.ignoreSubmodules to its default value in `_GIT_COMMON_OPTIONS`.
